title: Performance Verification of 7,424 × 7,424 Optical Switch Offering 1.4 μs Switching Time
venue: Optical Fiber Communications Conference and Exhibition
abstract: We experimentally verify performance of 7,424×7,424 optical switches that offer 1.4-μs switching time. Two key enablers are reported; newly developed polarization-insensitive 64×1 silicon-photonic switches integrated with wavelength-tunable filters, and a fast burst-mode coherent receiver.
